content.raw: There are many issues surrounding the networking and with my little to no experience in setting up networks, i'm asking if there is indeed a requirement to monitor the virtual sim remotely. As of right now, I can set my code to run completely just from pressing the start button on the constellation without ever needing to vpn or ssh. Would there be any rule against this?
